properties.areaDesc: Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula; Coastal Galveston; Matagorda Islands; Brazoria Islands; Chambers
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 5:36PM CST until January 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog.

* WHERE...Chambers, Coastal Galveston, Matagorda Islands,
Brazoria Islands and Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula
Counties.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense sea fog poised just off the coast
will be slowly expanding across the immediate coastal areas this
evening. Then expanding into the inland areas as temperatures
level off around 70 and the atmosphere becomes saturated.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of
distance ahead of you.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THURSDAY
